item.title: CVE-2024-43477|2024-09-19T21:52:41.816Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20entra
item.description: Improper access control in Decentralized Identity Services resulted in a vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated attacker to disable Verifiable ID's on another tenant.
